ben.description:
Together we will create a base script that will allow you to link subjects with their courses.
By the end of this project all 200 universities should have a list of subjects with many courses.

jeselle.description:
If a category-specific Guru creates multiple cardlets, how will these impact the public view of their category profile?

There will be two parts (this one part 1), the initial glance (2-3 mini cards, and a view all state)
jeselle.name: [Guru Public Profile] Mini Cardlet View

jeselle.description: This is the second state, assume that container will take over the entire right section & is one of the tab options
jeselle.name: [Guru Public Profile] Cardlet LIST View

jeselle.description:
Within the guru promote CTA, one of the options will be 'Distribute Great Content' or something like that.

When that is clicked, it will take over the entire page (just like the projector), and there will be a step by step graphic/animation centr
jeselle.name: [Guru Promote] Distribute Awesome Content: How it works
